website_summaries.verdict: Choose them if you are looking for organic diapers and don't mind the price. Otherwise, consider others we reviewed.
pros: Free of potential irritants such as chlorine, fragrances, petroleum, and latex
They sport a plant-based core and wetness indicator
cons: They are expensive, and have the tendency to leak

customer_reviews.title: Quality control is terrible for these diapers.
customer_reviews.text: In a theoretical sense, the design of the diaper, and the materials are good. The absorbency/leak protection is fine (but not perfect) as well. I like the compromise between eco consciousness and affordability. ***However, the quality control on these diapers is terrible! About 1/3 have the leg gussets glued to the main part of the diaper. You have to carefully peel them off and it leaves little pieces of torn plastic either on the gusset or--far worse--on the inner lining where the rub against baby's skin. A few were so bad that we tore the inner lining trying to open them. I would NOT buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: forand

customer_reviews.title: Ehhhhh no.
customer_reviews.text: When I was pregnant with my daughter I knew I wanted ALL babyganic products. We are an all organic family and sadly I do not like any of their products to be honest. Idk how many diaper packages I would get would smell like chemicals my husband says its the plastic but I didn't like that. I also got their bathset at our babyshower and come to find out on the EWG website its FULL of chemicals. Im so upset with the Babyganics brand I really wanted to love them we switched to MadeOf
customer_reviews.author: Kailee Lafer

customer_reviews.title: Splinters in diapers!?
customer_reviews.text: I loved these diapers until I found splinters in 3 diapers from the same pack. I’m glad that I noticed them before putting the diapers on my newborn, as they are very sharp and could have hurt him! Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Morris

customer_reviews.title: Size 1 great for my newborn!
customer_reviews.text: Loving the size 1 for my newborn! He was 8 pounds, 13 ounces and 22 inches long, so they fit right out of the gate at the hospital. He lost quite a bit of weight, and they fit great even when he was 7 pounds 9 ounces. No leaks so far, and he is a breaatfed baby that poops 10+ times a day. He is 3 weeks old now, over 9 pounds, and I'm still very happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: Blakely

customer_reviews.title: If baby has sensitive skin I wouldn't use them! They are rough to the touch and stiff.
customer_reviews.text: I got the diapers for my 1 month old. They are a little stiff and a bit rough. The absorption is pretty good as long as he doesn't pee to the side. I had him in the carrier and his diaper leaked when he wet. But this only happened once.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Conner

customer_reviews.title: They run small!!
customer_reviews.text: I like the quality of the diapers but they run small so I could only use them for about two weeks and my baby is only close to 12lbs and can no longer fit the size 1 diapers
customer_reviews.author: Renovacion Carismatica

customer_reviews.title: Hard as a rock
customer_reviews.text: I am one for a bargain. So when I saw that amazon was selling these for a good price, I went for it. You know, new mommy, needed a bargain. But when I get them they were so hard and stiff and barely fit on my baby. They felt like you were ripping apart paper everytime you put them on. Do not reccomend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We loved Andy Pandy but cannot get them these are our ...
customer_reviews.text: We've tried all the natural disposable diapers on here for night time wear. We loved Andy Pandy but cannot get them these are our next favorites.
customer_reviews.author: kelly

customer_reviews.title: Best Natural Diapers that you can get!!
customer_reviews.text: Soft diapers that come in bulk quantities, cost is similar to that of buying two packages from Babies R Us, but the price is good and competitive if Amazon is more convenient to you.
customer_reviews.author: Megeath Family

customer_reviews.title: Great diapers at a great price
customer_reviews.text: We really liked these, and I find them reasonably priced. The only problem we ever had with them leaking was if baby had an especially runny bowel movement sometimes it would kind of soak through and leak around the legs. Other than that we have been very happy and will continue to use them. Size one fits our 10 lbs baby perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Gee

customer_reviews.title: Too many leak episodes
customer_reviews.text: These diapers are not good. Leaks after 2-3 hours of use. Not worth it as I had so much extra laundry to wash, not to mention an angry wet baby. My baby also had a slight rash after one overnight use of these diapers. It definitely did not meet my babies needs. I orders the pure pampering and they seem to be working well.
customer_reviews.author: Victor D. Marcos

customer_reviews.title: Absorbant and nice on sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: My baby has a sensitive bottom and these diapers are great. Her rash went away and shes hasn't leaked through these so its definitely a repeat purchase.
customer_reviews.author: AB30

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Too many leaks. Breast milk baby poop went out straight the top.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive skin diapers
customer_reviews.text: I loved Babyganics diapers. They are pretty well made and didnt break out my babies sensitive skin like Pampers did.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Ball

customer_reviews.title: but overall I'm happy. Good price
customer_reviews.text: I get very occasional leak, but overall I'm happy. Good price, I feel good about not putting chemicals on my baby's butt.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Dead bug inside diapers
customer_reviews.text: One of the packages of diapers has a dead bug inside of it. I deserve a refund, this is disgusting.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Spradley

customer_reviews.title: Horrible diapers! I got these thinking they are natural ...
customer_reviews.text: Horrible diapers! I got these thinking they are natural and good quality.. I didn't have one diaper that didn't leak. I would not suggest to get them. They don't stand up to the money I spent on them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They run small!!
customer_reviews.text: These run smaller than most other brands so I wasted my money on diapers that don't fit 👎🏻
customer_reviews.author: mommywifelife

customer_reviews.title: Great Product - few issues
customer_reviews.text: Good Quality diapers only reasons I did not give full 5 star rating because: 1. In first pack of case there were 4 dummy diapers (missing sticky closure hubby threw away 2 I kept other 2); 2. Ordering a full case of one size diaper not ideal for us at rate baby is growing. Have 1 3/4 pack left over that can't fit baby. Size 1 may be ideal for newborn/slim frame babies. Baby born 23/12/2016 weighed 6lbs 13oz at birth. Photos attached shows 2 of defective diapers. Otherwise great product no blow outs or negative reactions.
customer_reviews.author: Maxwellsdaughter

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed, Leaking Diapers!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these and very disappointed. Several leaking issues with these diapers. Pampers work much much better. Trying Honest diapers next...
customer_reviews.author: JAbrams89

customer_reviews.title: Love these diapers
customer_reviews.text: These diapers are awesome! They hold a ton (way more than needed) and we've had very few blowouts since switching to these. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LinC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: the best diapers. great on preventing leaks. super comfy design.
customer_reviews.author: KATE LEVITTA

customer_reviews.title: These worked well for us for MOST days. A ...
customer_reviews.text: These worked well for us for MOST days. A few blow outs, coupled with deeper investigation in the chemicals used by this company, caused us to look into another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Drg

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as Huggies or Pampers at keeping the wet surface ...
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as Huggies or Pampers at keeping the wet surface away from skin at night. Also, the indicator is a joke. It gets blurry when Baby is really wet, but by then the diaper is swollen up anyway. They’re okay...
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh
customer_reviews.text: Diapers are absorbant but seems to still leak if you don't change it as soon as the baby pees. I'm not a fan of these and stopped my subscription to move to Huggies which fit and function much better
customer_reviews.author: Michael H

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad but don't expect to use these as overnight diapers ...
customer_reviews.text: Not too bad but don't expect to use these as overnight diapers if you're kid pees a lot :T We've had these leak numerous times but YMMV based on how full your kids' diapers normally are. Otherwise, it's a pretty decent diaper. Of course, I got these on sale - not sure I'd ever pay full price for these.
customer_reviews.author: j.lee

customer_reviews.title: Baby shower gift
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a baby shower gift because it was on the gift list and they were well received.
customer_reviews.author: KDG

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE PRODUCTS
customer_reviews.text: LOVE seeing babyganics diapers on amazon & i'm thrilled for the option to sign up for monthly deliveries-making life so much easier! These are the only diapers i'll use on my baby-very soft & comfortable. Not one leak since we started using them 7 months ago. I highly recommend these diapers!! (& while i'm at it, the baby wipes are great too!)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My little guy has turned one and doesn't even have super sensitive skin but pretty much ANY diaper is softer ...
customer_reviews.text: Diapers are so scratchy! My little guy has turned one and doesn't even have super sensitive skin but pretty much ANY diaper is softer than these. On a good day they agitate his skin and leave bumpy red spots from rubbing him with their sandpaper feel. They've actually scraped him too. Average pamper/Huggies much softer. Compared to other natural diapers earths best/honest are much softer. Ordered when they had a good coupon but am looking for someone local in need to give remainder to...
customer_reviews.author: A. White

customer_reviews.title: Man these diapers are fantastic. I'm normally a cloth user but I was ...
customer_reviews.text: Man these diapers are fantastic. I'm normally a cloth user but I was just having a rough time after my daughters delivery not to mention having a 2 year old running around... and a 14 year old. I had enough laundry and exhaustion to make me seek an eco friendly affordable alternative to cloth. These diapers are soft and absorbent, yes they do have the occasional blow out but what diaper doesn't. They're also cute. They're the best of both worlds in my opinion and I'm so glad I don't need to look any further.
customer_reviews.author: Nia.

customer_reviews.title: It says ultra absorbent on the box, definitely a LIE!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible diapers. My baby is undersize for 1 diapers and these STILL run small. They fit but barely and she has had more blow out leaks than any other diapers we've used so far. I would honestly just save your money because most likely theyre not going to fit your kid so either by the next size up or be prepared for lots of leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Chris H.

customer_reviews.title: Won't buy again
customer_reviews.text: I like that these are "organic" diapers, but they are not very absorbent, and have a funny fit. You have to get then on just so, or you will have a lot of leakage.
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: It's not because she needs a bigger size these diapers are just not good. I'll stick with the pampers or seventh generation
customer_reviews.text: Very expensive and not worth it. My daughter is 9lb and soaks through every single time. Every time she poops she is blowing them out. I have done laundry daily because of it. It's not because she needs a bigger size these diapers are just not good. I'll stick with the pampers or seventh generation !!
customer_reviews.author: Tara H.

customer_reviews.title: Defective Diapers
customer_reviews.text: I will never buy these diapers again. 1:3 of the package was defective. The right side tab tore consistentlyaboit 10 minutes after the diaper was put on my daughter. I was careful not to stretch the sides but it didn't matter. Such a huge waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: SBStacy99

customer_reviews.title: Compact !
customer_reviews.text: Our baby is in a size one and obviously not on the move and these are perfect! Love the pee strip that disappears when baby pees! These diapers are also compact and don't make it look like our girl is wearing some huge diaper! Love these !
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Wigner

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: We use these when we first got home front the hospital before transitioning to cloth diapers. They are absorbent and I haven't had any leaks. I will definitely buy this brand again to use when going out of town and not wanting to deal with cloth diapers and washing.
customer_reviews.author: Ramona

customer_reviews.title: GMO free life doesn't always work
customer_reviews.text: For baby #2, I wanted to be completely GMO free. This is my third diaper brand and I was impressed out of the box. They felt more like a diaper and less like a paper bag. However, they leak. We have 2-3 leaks a day using these diapers. I plan on using them until we run out but I will not buy again. It is a shame because I really wanted to like these.
customer_reviews.author: stdnjm11

customer_reviews.title: Good diaper.
customer_reviews.text: Great diaper, they work well for my daughter. I definitely agree with some other reviews, they do run on the small size. I would definitely go a size up if your infant is close to the upper weight limit.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2

customer_reviews.title: Sized right
customer_reviews.text: These worked well and fit well. The wipes gave my baby an allergic reaction though.
customer_reviews.author: Cori

customer_reviews.title: Beware... Bad blow-outs inevitable with these!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: can hold urine, has an indicator line Cons: will not hold poop. Poop slides up the back, up the front, and out the sides of the diaper. Almost always leads to horrific “blow-outs.” Would NOT buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Press

customer_reviews.title: GREAT product!!
customer_reviews.text: My wife & I absolutely LOVE these diapers (as well as a bunch of other products babyganics makes!) They seem to fit our son the best, and don't leak like other natural brands do! Highly recommend :)
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Wetness indicator sucks
customer_reviews.text: Please redesign the wetness indicator. The current design of wetness indicator is very hard to read, defeating the purpose. Pampers have done great job with the clean line.
customer_reviews.author: Sas

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: I loved the quality minus the stiffness. What I didn’t like was how small they actually are. Compared to pampers pure and amazon’s mama bear diapers, they’re so small for size 1.
customer_reviews.author: Anndrea

customer_reviews.title: Run small
customer_reviews.text: (Size 1) These were pretty good diapers at first. They are a lot smaller than pampers swaddled in the same size, they don’t come up as high in the back. Our baby started having lots of blowouts and she is about 11 lbs now. These diapers say they go up to 14 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: chemical burn
customer_reviews.text: This diaper gave my infant son a chemical burn. He was in pain and peeled. So much regret. We use Andy Pandy diapers they are amazing. Also, side note, this didn’t happen to his twin sister.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: I'm all for environmentally friendly products but these do not ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm all for environmentally friendly products but these do not work. Had 1 blow out and 2 pees leak in 1.5 weeks of use. Frustrating during 3am feedings.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Save your money. These diapers are probably the least absorbent I have ever used.
customer_reviews.author: LaundryLibrarian

customer_reviews.title: I love all the Babyganics products and am so happy to ...
customer_reviews.text: I love all the Babyganics products and am so happy to see these diapers are being sold on amazon. I have been using these diapers with my 9 month old and haven't moved to any other brand! My little girl has very sensitiveness skin and we tried a variety of diapers before finding babyganics. She has never had a diaper rash nor skin rash since using this product. The absorbency is great and i'm satisfied knowing I'm using a safe and quality product on my baby. I recommend these diapers to all my friends and they have all been happy too! The wipes and diaper cream are great too!
customer_reviews.author: Tomasz Szymanski

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Tabs rip off constantly and they leak almost every time. The only reason I gave 2 stars is because there are wetness indicators which is cool but I won't be buying these again.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: These diapers suck
customer_reviews.text: These diapers suck. Don't buy them. They were gifted to me and I wish I would have known how bad they were. They leak through and ruin the outfit and whatever the baby is sitting in. I've had to wash my clothes, the crib sheets, and her bouncy chair.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Flewellen

customer_reviews.title: These diapers run a little small, compared to Pampers ...
customer_reviews.text: These diapers run a little small, compared to Pampers. Also, I noticed they seem to leak if our baby wears them overnight. Otherwise, they are decent and don't seem to irritate my baby's skin.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Sallas

customer_reviews.title: The quality is okay, but it is to small ...
customer_reviews.text: The quality is okay, but it is to small. I bought size 1, but I compared them to the size N which I bought at Target, I found that they are the same.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Diaper leaks badly... Moving back to Pamper Swaddlers again
customer_reviews.text: This was shipped in 4 sets, using of set 1 was good. As soon as we opened set 2 we started facing diaper leaks very bad experience.
customer_reviews.author: Praveen Kumar Chakrapani

customer_reviews.title: Covers all diapering needs.
customer_reviews.text: Works great for our new born, lil' bit. To date, we have not had a blowout in the back yet. To me that makes them good diapers. No leaks either!
customer_reviews.author: Mike S.

customer_reviews.title: ... stars instead of one simply because they do seem pretty absorbent, but we somehow still end up with ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave them two stars instead of one simply because they do seem pretty absorbent, but we somehow still end up with way more leaks with these than Pampers or Huggies.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Ivy Casey

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: So happy Babyganics diapers are now on Amazon. We love them!
customer_reviews.author: marcy gotterbarn

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The size 1 fit like newborn sizes of other brands.
customer_reviews.author: GINA MARIE SERVILLO

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied! solid performance and quality
customer_reviews.text: I'll start by saying this -- in my experience, diapers are preventative AT BEST. What I mean is that, it is impossible for a diaper to work 100% leak-proof 100% of the time. Have I experienced leaks with these diapers? Yes. The fact is, I've experienced leaks with EVERY kind of diaper I've used so far. Other brands I've used include: Pampers, Andy Pandy, Up and Up (Target brand). At the end of the day, I've been satisfied with these diapers as far as size and leak protection goes. My baby is on the smaller side so these were perfect size wise. Enjoy1
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M.

customer_reviews.title: Leak and get huge immediately. The worst!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 month old daughter had this diaper on for maybe an hour and was wet through her clothes. The diaper had also blown up like a balloon. If you’re looking for a safe, organic, chlorine free diaper, go to Bambo or Earth’s Best. I’ve only tried Bambo and really like them. They hold both urgine and pop like a champ and don’t get huge. I’m still waiting to try Earth’s Best by have heard they are even better than Bambo. I will never buy these diapers again.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Doda

customer_reviews.title: Best disposables you can buy
customer_reviews.text: These diapers are fantastic! I am a cloth diapering mom, and swear by them after trying so many different brands of disposables and being dissatisfied with all of them. The fit on these diapers is excellent for my child. They don’t have a weird smell to them when he wets, whereas every other brand left him smelling of pee and like perfume. These are super absorbent and are great overnight. Overall, I’m just super impressed by these. It will definitely be my go-to when purchasing disposables. I am trying to think of something to add that I didn’t really like about them, but I honestly don’t have anything bad to say.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Just okay.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these with a great discount, but if that opportunity were to arise again, I'd skip it. The absorbency is average for an eco-friendly diaper. They fit very small compared to Seventh Generation, Pampers, Huggies, Luvs, and Target brand. They aren't the softest, but aren't necessarily rough either. The wetness indicator is located awkwardly far back on the diaper, so it can't be relied on. Not a big deal, but worth noting. While we're thankful for the awesome deal, we'll be sticking with Seventh Generation for future diaper purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with these!  Soft, no rashes!
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying all different diapers out there. It is important to me that they have no chemicals etc. and are better for the environment. We have tried 7thGeneration and Honest and these beat those in my book....they are soft and feel like they would be much more comfortable. Glad I tried them and signed up for the subscription service!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Too many accidents to handle, runs small
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is on the smaller side of weight and still these diapers felt too small. I had very regular cases of leaks after somehow managing to complete my box I don't think I'am going back to this brand. I chose these diapers in-spit of relative higher cost expecting that they will be better than others but I was sadly disappointed. With other brands my daughter is still using size 1 after a month.
customer_reviews.author: The online shopper

customer_reviews.title: Changed my mind!
customer_reviews.text: I originally thought they were leaking because my boy grew out of them but have since sized up. They leak terrible. In the past three days I have had five leak throughs, one huge blowout, and two that were almost blowouts. I know this can be a baby by baby case but for my boy they are terrible.
customer_reviews.author: ronni clark

customer_reviews.title: and I hands down love these for the fit and the fact that they ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is a little leaner, and these diapers fit her PERFECTLY!! We also received pampers at her baby shower, and I hands down love these for the fit and the fact that they don't add any harmful chemicals to the diapers. LOVE.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Tuttle

customer_reviews.title: TWO THUMBS DOWN! They are incredibly small, not ...
customer_reviews.text: TWO THUMBS DOWN! They are incredibly small, not very absorbent and not soft on his skin. After only going to the bathroom once, my son's onesie need to be change. We took a pack to daycare and they were very unimpressed as well. Definitely not worth the price or the hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and Minimal Chemicals!
customer_reviews.text: I love these diapers! They are super absorbent and more importantly they are made with a minimal amount of chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: TrailRunnerKJ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great but way to much money with out a coupon
customer_reviews.author: Heather Wolverton

customer_reviews.title: Not great.
customer_reviews.text: These diapers aren't the greatest. They are cute...but they leak. I won't be getting these again.
customer_reviews.author: mai'ingan13

customer_reviews.title: Soft and absorbent...
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and absorbent with an occasional leak. Over all good diaper, just overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: angela

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super absorbent diapers. My baby loves them and they are so soft. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: JIGISHA DHARIA

customer_reviews.title: Best diaper we've tried-even for overnight.  A+
customer_reviews.text: These diapers have proven themselves to be the most reliable diaper we've tried. I have 14 month old twin girls and an unreliable diaper can be a double mess! These don't cause a rash, serve as an overnight diaper and never leak. We're on size 4 currently and the economy pack is a great value and with the subscribe and save option its even better savings and convenient. A+
customer_reviews.author: STM

product_meta.title: Babyganics Ultra Absorbent Diapers Economy Pack, Size 1, 232 Count
product_meta.description: Diapers can be hard on the wallet and your baby’s sensitive skin. That’s why we developed our diapers to be gentle and effective, made with plant based ingredients and chlorine free. Our super absorbent diapers maintain fit, comfort and functionality. So go ahead and buy them by the ton, so you can appreciate them one-by-one.
feature_bullets: No: chlorine, latex, petroleum based lotions or fragrances
With 100% natural NeoNourish Seed Oil Blend to help nurture and support baby's skin
Soft-stretch sides, leak control and wetness indicator
NOTE : "The expiration date is for REWARDS not for the product

specifications.Manufacturer: KAS Direct LLC dba Healthy Home Products
